      • testIfGameIsOver

        protected java.util.List<Color> testIfGameIsOver(java.util.List<Color> colors)
                                          throws GameOverException
        Checks if there is at least one color to choose, if not a GameOverException will be thrown. Also removes colors that wouldn't change the score
        Parameters:
        colors - all colors that are available
        Returns:
        the set of colors a player can chose
        Throws:
